subject: custom results object
msgSnippet: Hi all I need to create a custom results object (Vector) which keeps the test execution data . Can some one give me an idea. suppose I have AdderTest case for
messageBody:
Hi all

I need to create a custom results object (Vector) which keeps the test
execution data .
Can some one give me an idea.

suppose I have AdderTest case for Adder class which has only two methods
add() and sub(). I am using tmp Vector as the results vector.When I run the
AdderTest class , I get only one value for tmp vector eventhough the assert
exceptions are thrown in both testAdd() and testSub() methods.


public class AdderTest extends TestCase {

private Vector tmp;

public AdderTest(String name) {
super(name);
tmp =new Vector();
}

public void testAdd() {
try {
assertEquals((new Adder()).add(50,30),10);

}
catch(Throwable t){
tmp.add(t.toString());
}


}

public void testSub() throws Throwable{ // ?
try {
assertEquals((new Adder()).sub(50,30),10);
}
catch(Throwable t){
tmp.add(t.toString());
}

}

public static void main(String[] args) {

junit.textui.TestRunner.run(AdderTest.class);


}
}

regards
mahesh
